title: Harness Documentation Quality Grades
description: Defines quality grades for all documents in .claude/. Each grade indicates the reliability, maintenance commitment, and review cadence of a document or directory.

authoritative.label: Authoritative
authoritative.description: Source of truth. Actively maintained and updated with every related change to the harness.

reference.label: Reference
reference.description: Useful context and guidance. Periodically reviewed but may lag behind latest harness changes.

archive.label: Archive
archive.description: Historical record preserved as-is. Not actively maintained. May contain outdated information.

draft.label: Draft
draft.description: Work in progress. Not yet reviewed or approved. Will be promoted to a higher grade or removed.

fileOverrides._comment: Per-file grade overrides. Use when a specific file in a directory has a different grade than the directory default.

promotionRules.draft_to_reference: Document has been reviewed and contains no known inaccuracies.
promotionRules.reference_to_authoritative: Document is actively maintained, linked from CLAUDE.md, and updated with every related change.
promotionRules.any_to_archive: Document is superseded, no longer relevant to current harness version, or refers to completed one-time work.
promotionRules.archive_to_removed: Document has been in archive for 6+ months with no references. Delete or move to separate archive.
